column2: A fully managed service to build, train, and deploy machine learning models.
A deep learning-enabled video camera for developing machine learning applications.

column1: What is AWS DeepRacer used for?
column2: A fun way to learn reinforcement learning, with a 1/18th scale race car.
Analyze images and videos to identify objects, people, text, and activities.
Build conversational interfaces using voice and text, powered by Alexa technology.

column1: What is the purpose of Amazon Transcribe?
column2: To add speech-to-text capability to applications.

column1: What insights can Amazon Comprehend provide?
column2: Uses NLP to find insights and relationships in text.
To deliver fast, high-quality, and affordable language translation.
